QuestData.Title: Turning the Tables
QuestData.Description: Azuregos and Kalecgos are due to meet up at the Northern Rocketway Terminus. You should meet with them there to make sure that Kalecgos doesn't require any additional help.$B$BShould you prefer to not be dead, Anara will likely be able to help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Anara to return to the world of the living, then meet with Kalecgos at the Northern Rocketway Terminus.
QuestData.RewardText: Great to see you again! Thank you for finding Azuregos and sending him to me.$B$BI do feel I owe you an apology - I may have undersold how difficult it would be to accomplish the task I gave you. You performed quite admirably, $n.
